content.text: Hi, my name is [user 1 name]. What's your name?
Hi, my name is [user 2 name]. It's nice to meet you.
It's nice to meet you too. I've heard that you're going to be attending [user 2 college name] soon.
Yes, I am! I'm really excited to start my new life there.
That's great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun. I'm a vegan, too. Have you been vegan for long?
I've been vegan for about a year now. I've been really enjoying it.
That's awesome! I've been vegan since I was five.
Wow! That's really impressive. I can't imagine being vegan at such a young age.
It's not that hard. I just grew up around it. My parents are both vegan, so it was just natural for me to become vegan too.
That's cool. I'm glad that you've found something that you're passionate about.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to read, cook, and watch movies.
Those are all great hobbies. I love to read, too. I'm not much of a cook, but I love to eat.
Me too! I love to try new foods. I'm also a big fan of movies.
I love movies, too. I'm always looking for new movies to watch.
I'm sure we'll get along well.
